summary: REQ-1/2/3 appear implemented in the modified frontend code (upload UI removed, preloaded list switched to 6 Ghibli images, and storybook framing/text added). REQ-4 is not evidenced because no new static image assets were added in the diff (0 files added), even though the code references the required /assets/generated/*.png paths.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the 6 newly generated images as static frontend assets under frontend/public/assets/generated/ with the exact specified filenames, and reference them directly from the frontend.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no added files (Added: 0). While code references the new image paths, there is no evidence the actual PNG assets were added under frontend/public/assets/generated/ as required.
evidence: frontend/src/content/preloadedPhotos.ts (references /assets/generated/*.png but does not add assets)

hallucinated_features.description: Background audio autoplay/interaction-triggered looping music added to App
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not request adding or changing audio behavior/features; only requested photo upload removal and gallery/storybook presentation updates.
evidence: frontend/src/App.tsx (creates new Audio('/assets/audio/tamil-friendship-song.mp3'), plays/loops, user-interaction start logic)

hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest required exactly 6 specified images; it did not request adding/using a fallback image asset/path.
evidence: frontend/src/components/PhotosSection.tsx (FALLBACK_IMAGE constant and error handling to swap to fallback)
